title: 18: S6E18 – "The Paranormal Price" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from authors Matt Dymerski, Christopher Maxim, Christopher Bloodworth, and Aric Sundquist, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about oppressive evils, conniving cults, gruesome games, and alarming attractions.

                               
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
